requirements.summary: Add the address 'Akurdi near Khandoba Mandir, Pimpri Chinchwad, Pune 411035' as plain text in the Contact page, styled consistently with existing text
acceptanceCriteria: The address 'Akurdi near Khandoba Mandir, Pimpri Chinchwad, Pune 411035' is visible in the Contact section/page.
The address is rendered as plain text, styled consistently with other text content on the Contact page.
No phone number, email, or other contact details are added alongside the address.
No other sections or pages are affected.

file_operations.description: Add the address 'Akurdi near Khandoba Mandir, Pimpri Chinchwad, Pune 411035' as plain text in the contact information section, displayed with the same styling as existing text elements on the page. The address should be positioned logically within the existing layout without adding any other contact details or modifying the form structure.
